attributes.action: Allow residents in care homes to have their freedom back.
attributes.background: Lift the Covid rules for care homes. Stop treating them like prisoners. They deserve better than less.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about restrictions on care home residents, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Enact law for visiting rights for designated relatives of care home residents: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563332

Allow care home residents to leave without self-isolating on return: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583440

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what changes to Covid-19 restrictions relating to care homes you would like the Government or Parliament to change or remove.
